response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to both parties, with its worth estimated at $1,200,000 to you. I am offering this remarkable asset to you at a special price of $1,100,000, aiming to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction.

Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and if you would like to proceed with the purchase. I am here to answer any questions or provide additional information to ensure your confidence in this investment.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1100000}
